::DarkMouse::

She stood there , shaking. "Yes, Your darned right I'm scared of him. 
He hurt me once.  I don't aim to let him hurt me again."
She frowned at Quickstrike. "I may be a predacon. But honor says I 
can't lie like that."  She was sill shaking.  It wasn't fear that 
made her shake, it was the energon in her.  She hated this side 
effect of it.  It was something she couldn't control.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> Quickstrike:
> 
> 
> 
> Quickstrike looked at Dark Mouse. "Yer scared." he said. He looked 
> over to Black Arachnia. "Listen we jus' blew its head off, we're 
> safe. An' if yer afraid of Megatron, ah know how t' get ya outta 
it. 
> Jus' lie," he whispered. "That'll save yer kiester."
